globalAttributes.name: data-cursor-object
globalAttributes.description: Indicates that this element is a cursor.

globalAttributes.name: data-cursor-shape
globalAttributes.description: The shape of the cursor. Prefer using your own css for more custom cursors.

globalAttributes.name: data-cursor-size
globalAttributes.description: The size of the cursor in px (defaults to 48). Prefer using your own css for more custom cursors.
